main.name: HARIKRISHNAN  MOHAN
tagline: Creating websites that solve your problems
before you even know they exist.
main.shortBioPartOne: Hi, I'm Hari, a seasoned frontend developer with over six years of experience. I have successfully delivered products for companies and businesses worldwide, ranging from marketing websites to complex solutions.
main.shortBioPartTwo: My work emphasizes fast, elegant, and accessible user experiences, ensuring both functionality and aesthetic appeal.
main.bio: Hi there! I am Hari! I've been coding for over 6 plus years now. As a frontend developer, I've worked in large corporations to help build & scale their companies. Over the year I understood that my strong skill is coding. Also, I've worked as Data Analyst - research and analysis of data that is customer focused.
main.myExpertise: My expertise lies in transforming concepts and wireframes into captivating designs that resonate with users. I leverage a diverse skill set that encompasses HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with various frameworks and libraries, to build responsive and interactive interfaces across multiple devices and platforms.

education.description: Graduated with First Class Honours (7.3 GPA)

work.title: System Engineer
work.description: Developing webpages using various front end tool and learnig new tech
